name: Reliance (ChioButterfly)
description:
So this is a game I had an idea for scream machine. I only had about 14 hours to work on the game though so it's not to great but a general idea is there im pretty sure you can fall off the edge as well lol but there isn't an end just the two enemies and one is broken

WASD is movement

down, left, and right arrow keys are for the three different shield

Like i said it's not great and it's more just a concept piece but everything was done solo and i plan on finishing this game and polishing the heck out of it <3
